verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Rain has showered far her drip Splash and trickle running Plant has flowered in the sun Shell and pebble sunning

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: So begins another spring Green leaves and of berries Chiff-chaff eggs are painted by Mother-bird eating cherries

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: In a misty tangled sky Fast a wind is blowing In a newborn rabbit's heart River life is flowing

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: From the dark and whetted soil Petals are unfolding From the stony village kirk Easter bells of old rings
